Title: On the Road
Writer: Garth Ennis (based on the graphic novels by), Steve Dillon (based on the graphic novels by), Sam Catlin (developed by), Seth Rogen (developed by), Evan Goldberg (developed by), Sam Catlin, Mary Laws (executive story editor), Olivia Dufault (story editor)
Actors: Dominic Cooper, Joseph Gilgun, Ruth Negga, Graham McTavish
Plot: Jessie, Tulip, and Cassidy hit the road in search of God and are stalked by a killer cowboy from hell.
